com.vtls.opensource.unapi
Class UNAPIFormat

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<Object,Object>
          java.util.Properties
              com.vtls.opensource.unapi.UNAPIFormat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Map<Object,Object>
public class UNAPIFormat
extends Properties

An abstraction of an individual 'format' in the unAPI framework. From: http://unapi.info/specs/ <format> <name>oai_dc</name> <type>application/xml</name> <namespace_uri>http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/</namespace_uri> <schema_location>http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd</schema_location> </format>

Author:
Joe Liversedge liversedgej@vtls.com
See Also:
Serialized Form
